import React from 'react'; import { Box, Button, Typography, Container, Grid } from '@mui/material'; import PatientNavbar from './components/PatientNavbar'; const PatientDashboard: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useUser(); return (
{/* Navbar */} {/* Greeting */} Hi, {user?.id}! {/* Container with options */} Patient Dashboard
); }; export default PatientDashboard;
